source:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_00Hortefense would have you assist his man in Gridania in a search for an absent adventurer.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

Hortefense aimerait faire appel à vos talents d'aventuri pour aider un couple à se former à Gridania.

source:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_01Hortefense asks you to assist his mission in Gridania by tracking down a local lady's missing swain. The emissary in charge of the case awaits you by the amphitheatre gates. He will introduce you to the lady in question, so that you might listen to her plea.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Hortefense vous a chargé de retrouver un jeune homme pour le compte d'une Gridanienne qui aimerait lui faire sa déclaration d'amour. Pour écouter l'histoire en détail de la bouche même de la jeune femme, adressez-vous au messager de l'amour qui se trouve à l'entrée de l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto.

source:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_02The troubled maiden explains how her love is an adventurer, who recently departed on yet another mission. Unfortunately, the absent-minded fellow left no word of his destination. All that the lady can recall is that he often spoke of in the days before his disappearance. She would be most grateful if you could track down her roving beau, and deliver to him a fragrant charm of her own design.

※Please note that the adventurer you seek will not be marked on the map, nor will any identifying symbol appear above the character's head. Share your information with other players, and try to find him.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_02La jeune femme enamourée vous a confié que l'homme qu'elle aime a parlé de avant de disparaître. Tentez de le retrouver grâce à cette information et remettez-lui de la part de la jeune femme.

Le personnage que vous devez localiser ne sera mis en évidence par aucune indication visuelle sur la carte ou sur sa plaque de nom. Échangez des informations avec les autres joueurs et fiez-vous à votre instinct pour le retrouver!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_03<tab>You present the charm to Frageorloix in Bentbranch Meadows. He recognizes its craftsmanship as that of his sweetheart, confirming that he is indeed the swain you seek. He returns to Gridania to be reunited with his lady love, and to prepare a gift of his own. All that remains is to return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, and report your success to the emissary.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez remis <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A940202 /var> à Frageorloix. Retournez à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto pour annoncer la bonne nouvelle au messager de l'amour.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_04<tab>The emissary thanks you for your efforts in finding Frageorloix, and for passing on the maiden's token of affection. But there is another whose suit remains unanswered: it seems that Ser Hortefense searches for his own lost love─a “noblewoman of paramount virtue.” Might this fit the description of anyone you know?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SEQ_04<tab>Grâce à vos talents d'in<var 16 /var>ves<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ga<var 16 /var>tion, la jeune Gridanienne a pu faire sa déclaration à Frageorloix, qui y a répondu favorablement. Après vous avoir remercié<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> pour votre aide, le messager de l'amour vous a appris que Hortefense était à la recherche d'une jeune femme “noble et raffinée”. Peut-être est-ce quelqu'un que vous connaissez<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the House Valentione emissary in Gridania.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_00<tab>Parler au messager de l'amour de Gridania

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_01<tab>Locate the absent adventurer and give him the fragrant charm.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_01<tab>Trouver le jeune homme et lui remettre <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8A940202 /var>

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_02<tab>Report to the House Valentione emissary in Gridania.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_TODO_02<tab>Parler au messager de l'amour de Gridania

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_000<tab>A lady from this very city came to us, requesting our help to deliver a Valentione's gift to her roving swain. Yet, try as we might, we have been unable to pick up his trail in this labyrinth of trees. Why, if not for the bread crumbs I scattered in my wake, I might very well have been lost myself!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_000<tab>J'aimerais vous demander de retrouver quelqu'un de Gridania. Pour commencer, adressez-vous au messager de l'amour qui se trouve à l'entrée de l'amphithéâtre, il va vous présenter la jeune femme qui voudrait faire sa déclaration.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_001<tab>Mayhap a <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((gentleman)) /var> such as yourself, who is more familiar with these parts, will find some insight in what little information the lady can provide. Pray speak with my man at the amphitheatre gates─he will introduce you to the lady in question.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_001<tab>Écoutez bien at<var 16 /var>ten<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>ve<var 16 /var>ment les in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions qu'elle vous donnera concernant l'élu de son cœur et vous trouverez peut-être une piste intéressante.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_002<tab>I could find my way through a blizzard in a snowfield by the merest undulation of the ice, yet in these forests I cannot tell one tree from the other. Pray meet with my man by the gates, and listen to the poor maiden's story. No doubt there is some vital clue in her words that we have overlooked.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_002<tab>Adressez-vous au messager de l'amour qui se trouve à l'entrée de l'amphithéâtre. Il se chargera de faire les arrangements nécessaires pour que vous puissiez rencontrer la jeune femme qui voudrait déclarer sa flamme.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_010<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>. Might you be one of the assistants of whom Lord Hortefense informed me? Very good. I shall fetch the lady forthwith.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_010<tab>Bien le <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((bonsoir)) ((bonjour)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((bonjour)) ((bonsoir)) /var>)) /var>, aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. Sire Hortefense m'a mis au courant de votre visite. Attendez un instant, je vais prévenir la jeune femme qui a fait appel à nous.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_011<tab>I am most grateful for your assistance, adventurer. If my darling doesn't receive my gift before Valentione's Day is over, we shall be doomed to part. It may seem like mere superstition to you, but for me it is painfully real! Please find him, I beg you!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_011<tab>Enchantée de faire votre con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce. On m'a dit que vous pourriez retrouver l'homme que j'aime, c'est vrai<var 1D /var>? Il n'y a rien que je désire plus au monde...

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_012<tab>My love is an adventurer like yourself. He set out on an expedition some days ago, but he has yet to return. I'm sure no harm can have come to him─he's so strong, and brave, and handsome─but I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> wish he would have told me where he was going.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_012<tab>Avant de disparaître, il vivait d'aventures, tout comme vous. Un jour, il est parti en mission sans me dire où il allait, et je ne l'ai plus revu depuis.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_013<tab>This is my gift for him─a charm I prepared from a cutting of the most fragrant tree in the Twelveswood. I agonized for hours over selecting the perfect spray, and poured my heart and soul into whittling it just so. If he could only see it, I am sure he would understand just how much I care...
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_013<tab>La Valention approchant, j'ai fabriqué ce petit talisman en symbole de mes sentiments pour lui. Si vous pouviez le retrouver et le lui remettre, je vous en serais éter<var 16 /var>nel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sante...

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_014<tab>...Do I have any idea where he might have gone? Well...I can't be sure it's related, but he oft spoke of chocobos before he left. I'm sorry─it isn't much to go on, I know...
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_014<tab>Si j'ai une idée de l'endroit où il pourrait se trouver<var 1D /var>? C'est difficile à dire... Tout ce dont je me rappelle, c'est qu'il a mentionné quelque chose à propos de <var 1A 02 /var>chocobos<var 1A 01 /var> avant de s'en aller.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_015<tab>...Do I have any idea where he might have gone? Well...I can't be sure it's related, but he oft spoke of the Central Shroud before he left. I'm sorry─it isn't much to go on, I know...
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_015<tab>Si j'ai une idée de l'endroit où il pourrait se trouver<var 1D /var>? C'est difficile à dire... Tout ce dont je me rappelle, c'est qu'il parlait souvent de <var 1A 02 /var>la Forêt centrale<var 1A 01 /var> les jours qui ont précédé son départ.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_016<tab>Forgive me for burdening you with my troubles, but I simply must have him know of my love before it is too late. If you could find him for me and deliver my gift, I would be eternally grateful!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_GIRLA00515_000_016<tab>J'aimerais pouvoir vous être d'une plus grande aide mais malheureusement, je n'en sais pas plus. Je vous en prie, retrouvez mon bien-aimé<var 1D /var>! J'ai bien peur que ce soit ma dernière chance de lui avouer mon amour...

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_017<tab>So there you have it. That is the information we have to go on. Do you think you will be able to find this adventuring sweetheart of hers before Valentione's Day is over?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_017<tab>Alors, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, qu'est-ce que ça vous inspire<var 1D /var>? Pensez-vous être capable de retrouver la trace de cet homme avec ce seul indice<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_018<tab>Should you find the task too daunting, perhaps you might discuss the matter with your fellow adventurers. They may have bumped into this fellow on their travels, or gleaned some other clue as to his current location.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_018<tab>Si vous éprouvez des difficultés, je vous conseille d'en parler avec vos collègues aventuriers, ils auront peut-être des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions in<var 16 /var>té<var 16 /var>res<var 16 /var>santes à partager.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_019<tab>I am afraid that all <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> can offer is a redoubled request: please do whatever you can to find this man, and deliver the charm unto him. For this is Valentione's Day, and as a loyal servant of House Valentione, it pains me to see such a gift go undelivered. I am counting on you, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_019<tab>Courage, je suis sûr que vous pouvez réussir<var 1D /var>! Pensez à l'amour de cette jeune femme qui ne demande qu'à trouver écho dans le cœur de son bien-aimé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>During this quest, the location of the absent adventurer will not be marked on the map, nor will any identifying symbol appear above the character's head. Speak with other players and share your information, and try to find him!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Le personnage que vous devez localiser ne sera mis en évidence par aucune indication visuelle sur la carte ou sur sa plaque de nom. Échangez des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec les autres joueurs et fiez-vous à votre instinct pour le retrouver<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_021<tab>It seems the gentleman in question was talking about chocobos before he left. Might he be looking to hire one...or purchase one, perhaps? I fear I would not know where to go were I to attempt the same. Perhaps your fellow adventurers might have some better idea?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_021<tab>L'homme que vous devez retrouver a parlé de <var 1A 02 /var>chocobos<var 1A 01 /var> avant de s'en aller... Échanger des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec les autres aventuriers vous mettra peut-être sur une piste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_022<tab>It seems the gentleman in question was talking about the Central Shroud before he left. ...Which way is that again? Forgive me, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>─I fear I know too little of these forests to be of any use to you. Perhaps your fellow adventurers might be of more help?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_022<tab>L'homme que vous devez retrouver a parlé de <var 1A 02 /var>la Forêt centrale<var 1A 01 /var> avant de s'en aller... Échanger des in<var 16 /var>for<var 16 /var>ma<var 16 /var>tions avec les aventuriers que vous croiserez vous mettra peut-être sur une piste<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_023<tab>What ho, <var 08 E905 ((my lady)) ((my lord)) /var>! How fares your search? I must make a little confession: you are not the only adventurer I have asked to assist us in this matter. When it comes to finding loved ones, the more the merrier, I say!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_023<tab><var 08 E905 ((Cette chère)) ((Ce cher)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Alors, comment se passe votre petite enquête<var 1D /var>? N'oubliez pas, le pouvoir de l'amour est avec vous, et il est plus fort que tout<var 1D /var>!

source:
TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_030Ah, a fellow adventurer! )) (( )) 02 /var>, is it? Might you be interested in joining my party? I was just about to head down into─
...What? You have a Valentione's Day gift for me?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_030<tab>Salut, collègue aventuri<var 08 E905 ((ère)) ((er)) /var>. En quoi puis-je t'être utile<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_031<tab>A charm...? Why, this is a gift from my darling! I would recognize her craftsmanship anywhere. Thank you for bringing it to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>...but however did you find me? I don't recall telling anyone that I was coming to Bentbranch.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_031<tab>... Je ne lui ai jamais dit où je partais, et pourtant elle a réussi à me retrouver et à me faire parvenir ce présent. Désolé de t'avoir mêlé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à cette histoire, l'ami<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_032<tab>I see... Then I thank you again for the trouble you've taken. Did you know that these charms have become something of a Valentione's Day tradition in Gridania? Superstition has it that couples who fail to exchange them are fated to separate, and my lady has quite convinced herself this is true.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_032<tab>Savais-tu qu'à Gridania, il est de coutume de fabriquer ce genre de petit talisman pour faire une déclaration à l'occasion de la Valention<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_033<tab>...A fact that I had quite forgotten. Forgive me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but I had best return to Gridania─I have a charm to prepare. Thank you once more for seeking me out, my friend─if not for you, chances are I would be sleeping in the stables tonight!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_LOVER00515_000_033<tab>Je crois que j'ai enfin compris. Cette carrière d'aventurier n'était qu'une excuse pour fuir ma destinée, et il est temps d'embrasser ma dulcinée. Merci de m'avoir ouvert les yeux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_040<tab>Welcome back, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>, and congratulations on finding the missing man! He passed through the city gates not a few minutes ago, the charm at his belt. There they are over there, do you see? Reunited at last, and displaying every evidence of happiness!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, quel bonheur de vous revoir<var 1D /var>! J'ai appris que vous aviez pu remettre le talisman de cette jeune femme à l'élu de son cœur. Elle était vraiment ravie et... Oh, regardez<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_041<tab>Thanks to your magnificent efforts, their devotion to each other has flowered anew! You have done a great service for House Valentione this day.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_041<tab>On dirait bien que sa déclaration est un succès total, hi hi. Et c'est grâce à vous<var 1D /var>! Ils forment vraiment un mignon petit couple, vous ne trouvez pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_042<tab>...And speaking of services to House Valentione, did you happen to come across a “noblewoman of paramount virtue” on your travels?
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_042<tab>... Au fait, je change com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment de sujet, mais vous n'auriez pas aperçu une jeune femme “noble et raffinée” dans les parages<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_043<tab>Prithee, do not misunderstand─I do not seek one for myself. Lord Hortefense requested that I search for such a lady. If you happen to know of anyone who fits the description, I am sure he would be most grateful for the information.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_043<tab>Sire Hortefense semble être à la recherche d'une personne répondant à cette description. Si jamais vous remarquez quelque chose, vous devriez le mettre au courant.

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_044<tab>But for now, your work in Gridania is complete! Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((m'lady)) ((m'lord)) /var>─without <var 08 E905 ((women)) ((men)) /var> like you, the world would be a less passionate place!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_MISSIONARY00515_000_044<tab>Eh bien, je crois que notre col<var 16 /var>la<var 16 /var>bo<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>tion s'arrête ici. Je suis sûr que d'autres couples ont besoin d'un dernier coup de pouce pour se former dans les autres cités d'Éorzéa. Profitez de la Valention pour les aider<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_045<tab>How goes the search, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>? ...You have already located the missing man!? Oh, but that is wonderful news! I knew that I could rely on you!
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_HORTEFENSE_000_045<tab>Vraiment, vous avez réussi à retrouver l'amour perdu de cette jeune femme<var 1D /var>? Magnifique<var 1D /var>! Grâce à vous, l'amour triomphe une fois de plus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>You have successfully assisted the emissaries of House Valentione in all three city<var 1F /var>states! Return to Hortefense in Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre to report your success.
target: TEXT_FESVLT102_00515_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Vous êtes venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> en aide aux messagers de l'amour des trois cités<var 1D /var>! Retournez à l'amphithéâtre de Mih Khetto pour mettre Hortefense au courant.
